channel.title: God weapons
channel.description:
These are some RS gods weapons i made out of my imagination , expect the guthix spear. I think one already exists in RS, Tried to make the poly as lowest as possible. Also feel free to download if you like them, you can re-color them if you don't like the colors or use them in your RSPS or just stare at them..
________________________________________
[size=12pt][u][b]Download:[/b][/u][/size]
[url=https://www.mediafire.com/?aiojn3tzez35bve]MediaFire - G0d weps pack.rar[/url]

item.title: God weapons
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Your designs are under simplified, usually simplicity is key but you missed the mark with these. Try spending some more time on your designs, you’ll see better results.

The colouring is fine on the zammy sword but was off on the guthix spear, on the sara hammer it was fine but a little over done.

You also used too much poly for the models, i understand you might have made it for the colouring purpose but you wouldn’t have lost anything by using less poly here.

Never the less, good work and i can see you improving there are just a few parts you need to work on.

Read full topic

item.title: God weapons
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

Docent:

Both the Zamorak Sword and Guthix Staff look nice but the Saradomin Hammer’s head is too wide in my opinion.

It used to be like this:

[spoiler][/spoiler]

I don’t remember why i changed it…
